      • addCustomAccessTokenClaims

        protected void addCustomAccessTokenClaims(com.nimbusds.jwt.JWTClaimsSet.Builder builder,
                                          org.mitre.oauth2.model.OAuth2AccessTokenEntity token,
                                          org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.OAuth2Authentication authentication)
        Hook for subclasses that allows adding custom claims to the JWT that will be used as access token.
        参数:
        builder - the builder holding the current claims
        token - the un-enhanced token
        authentication - current authentication
